questions.question: What is Phoebe playing when the lights go out?
questions.explanation: Phoebe is introduced as playing her guitar at Central Perk when the lights go out.

questions.question: Where is Chandler trapped when the blackout occurs?
questions.explanation: Chandler is inside the ATM vestibule of a bank when the lights go out.

questions.question: Who is with Chandler in the ATM vestibule?
questions.explanation: Chandler is trapped with Jill Goodacre, a Victoria's Secret model, in the ATM vestibule.

questions.question: What does Joey use to light up the room?
questions.explanation: Joey enters with a menorah, the candles lit, to provide light during the blackout.

questions.question: What is the name of the song Phoebe starts to sing at Central Perk?
questions.correct_answer: None of the above, the song is not specified
questions.explanation: Phoebe starts to sing a song about realizing what life is all about, but the title is not specified.

questions.question: What is Ross's response when Rachel talks about not having passion in a relationship?
options: He tells her that passion is overrated
He says she will find someone with passion
questions.correct_answer: He tells her that passion is overrated
questions.explanation: Ross tells Rachel that passion is way overrated and that what's left after it burns out is trust, security, and other good things.

questions.question: What does Chandler say when Jill offers him gum?
questions.explanation: Chandler asks if the gum is sugarless when Jill offers it to him.

questions.question: What is the name of the cat that Rachel finds?
questions.explanation: Phoebe refers to the cat as 'poor little Tooty' after it jumps on Ross's shoulder.

questions.question: Who does Ross talk to about his feelings for Rachel?
questions.explanation: Ross talks to Joey about his feelings for Rachel and how he's waiting for the right moment to make a move.

questions.question: What is the name of the Italian hunk that Rachel meets?
questions.explanation: Rachel meets an Italian hunk named Paolo, who is the owner of the cat she found.

questions.question: What does Ross tell Paolo about his relationship with Rachel?
options: That they are kind of a thing
questions.correct_answer: That they are kind of a thing
questions.explanation: Ross tells Paolo that he and Rachel are 'kind of a thing' and that Paolo should not get in the way of their relationship.

questions.question: What is the game that Ross, Monica, and Joey are playing when Rachel and Paolo enter?
questions.explanation: Ross, Monica, and Joey are playing Monopoly when Rachel and Paolo enter the apartment.

questions.question: What does Phoebe say about being the last to know things?
options: That she loves being the last to know
That she hates being the last to know
That she's always the first to know
That she's never the last to know
questions.correct_answer: That she hates being the last to know
questions.explanation: Phoebe says that she's always the last to know everything and that it's so typical.

questions.question: What does Jill do to help Chandler when he's choking?
options: She gives him the Heimlich maneuver
She slaps him on the back
questions.correct_answer: She gives him the Heimlich maneuver
questions.explanation: Jill gives Chandler the Heimlich maneuver when he's choking on gum.

questions.question: What does Ross do when Paolo is talking to Rachel in Italian?
questions.explanation: Ross mocks Paolo's speech, repeating 'blah blah blah' in a sarcastic tone.

questions.question: What is the name of the cat's owner that Phoebe and Rachel meet?
questions.explanation: Phoebe and Rachel meet Mr. Heckles, who claims that the cat belongs to him.

questions.question: What does Joey tell Ross to do about his feelings for Rachel?
options: To tell her how he feels
To wait for the right moment
To ask her out on a date
questions.correct_answer: To tell her how he feels
questions.explanation: Joey tells Ross to make a move and tell Rachel how he feels, or else he'll be stuck in the 'friend zone' forever.

questions.question: What is the activity that Chandler and Jill do together in the ATM vestibule?
options: Swinging a pen around their heads
questions.correct_answer: Swinging a pen around their heads
questions.explanation: Chandler and Jill play a game where they swing a pen around their heads, with Jill teaching Chandler how to do it.

questions.question: What does Ross say to Paolo about Rachel?
options: That she's kind of a thing
questions.correct_answer: That she's kind of a thing
questions.explanation: Ross tells Paolo that he and Rachel are 'kind of a thing', implying a romantic relationship.

questions.question: What does Phoebe say about Paolo's bottom lip?
options: That she wants to bite it
questions.correct_answer: That she wants to bite it
questions.explanation: Phoebe says that she wants to bite Paolo's bottom lip, finding it attractive.

questions.question: What is the reason for the blackout, according to Monica's mother?
questions.explanation: Monica's mother says that they have no idea when the power will come back on, implying that the reason for the blackout is unknown.

questions.question: What does Chandler do when Jill leaves the ATM vestibule?
options: He waits for her to come back
He presses his face against the glass door
questions.correct_answer: He presses his face against the glass door
questions.explanation: Chandler presses his face against the glass door after Jill leaves the ATM vestibule, showing his infatuation with her.

questions.question: What is the name of the holiday that Joey uses as an excuse to light the menorah?
questions.explanation: Joey uses the menorah to light up the room, saying 'Happy Chanukah, everyone'.

questions.question: What does Ross say is the definitive maniacal laugh?
questions.explanation: Ross says that his laugh, 'Mwwwooooo-hah-hah', is the definitive maniacal laugh.

questions.question: What is the reason for Ross's sadness at the end of the episode?
options: He got into a fight with Joey
questions.explanation: Ross is sad because he sees Rachel kissing Paolo, realizing that he has missed his chance with her.

questions.question: What does Chandler ask the security camera for at the end of the episode?
questions.explanation: Chandler asks the security camera for a copy of the tape, wanting to relive his time with Jill in the ATM vestibule.
